item.title: Restake support
item.description: Hi stakers!, we’ve enabled restaking support for 3ventures validators in several networks: Restake (you can click on the icons for each network to select which one you want to use), is a service that performs several tasks and provides some benefits for you: Your wallet (Keplr for example) provides an authorization for the restaking operation, that is: just claim rewards on the validator and compound the rewards into staking, nothing else.
